answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Dee, 
Unfortunately I was not able to find specific policies and procedures related to E-Z Pass Transponders on the Knowledge Network. However I was able to find an article on using the E-Z Pass between states ( East Coat America Joins Hands- ICMA icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/4994 ). Please feel free to ask any additional questions and hopefully members with more specific policies will chime in throughout the day. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Dee Wright
text: Would you please provide us with any policies and procedures you have in place related to the E-Z Pass Transponder?  Thank you.
title: E-Z Pass Transponder
